name: Straight Outta Control (CrustyJon)
description:
Due to your unpredictable nature, the leaders of Control, the last city on Earth after the apocalypse, have kicked you out, leaving you with only a crummy car without a steering wheel. You must travel the wastes, using your magic hammer to create walls you can reposition yourself with, searching for a way to fix your car... because not being able to turn is really annoying!

W and S to accelerate, SPACE to boost and kill enemies, SHIFT to use handbrake, and LMB to build walls.

Have fun, and thank you for playing!
